name: Karma (itch) (PhenixEmporium)
description:
Note: The tutorial says arrow keys to move, but, WASD also functions just fine, it's what the text should have said.

Welcome to Karma, a first person shooter where the only way to kill your enemies is to hit them with their own bullets.  You can at anytime swap places with a targeted enemy, send them into their own bullets, their friends bullets, or merely use them in order to quickly traverse around the area.

Enemies spawn faster and faster until your karma finally comes back to bite you.

This is merely a demo for the GMTK game jam and thus due to time-constraints features no scoring mechanisms nor win-conditions.
